snippet: Mexico goes to the polls to elect a new president on July 1, and Texas lawmakers are paying almost as much attention to that event as to the November election here.
lead_paragraph: Mexico goes to the polls to elect a new president on July 1, and Texas lawmakers are paying almost as much attention to that event as to the November election here.

headline.seo: Texas Lawmakers Warily Watch Mexico’s Election
headline.main: Texas Lawmakers Warily Watch Mexico’s Election
headline.print_headline: State Lawmakers Warily Watch Mexico’s Election
